mathtools.is_power_of_two¶

abjad.tools.mathtools.is_power_of_two(expr)¶

True when expr is an integer or rational power of 2, otherwise False.

abjad> for n in range(10):
...     print n, mathtools.is_power_of_two(n)
... 
0 True
1 True
2 True
3 False
4 True
5 False
6 False
7 False
8 True
9 False
abjad> mathtools.is_power_of_two(-4)
False

abjad> mathtools.is_power_of_two('foo')
False
